alert.note: Alert for East Feliciana; Pointe Coupee; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 9:34PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of West Feliciana, northwestern Pointe Coupee, northwestern East Feliciana Parishes in southeastern Louisiana and southeastern Wilkinson Counties through 1015 PM CST... At 934 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Batchelor, or 12 miles southeast of Simmesport, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Wakefield, Fort Adams, Lettsworth, Spillman and Batchelor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Feliciana; Pointe Coupee; West Feliciana
